alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:20PM CDT until May 07 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL COLEMAN AND CENTRAL RUNNELS COUNTIES... At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ballinger, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hatchel around 430 PM CDT. Benoit around 435 PM CDT. Crews around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Winters Lake and Ballinger Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
